snippet.title: Overhaul - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Overhaul launches on Steam on October 14, 2022! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1608660/Overhaul/

Overhaul is a rogue-lite puzzle game that combines fast-paced action and quick logical thinking. As Ikalee, venture deep into the abandoned Power Plant to bring the power back to your village. A place that has now been taken over by hostile and mysterious life forms.

---

Bread Panda is a small indie studio from a pack of French pals working on games that are worth your time.
http://www.breadpandagames.com

Follow us over there to stay in touch with us!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BreadPandaGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BreadPandaGames/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/breadpandagames/

Trailer edited by our bro Gaëtan Jeanson: https://www.gaetanjeanson.com
